command.text: &ExportImportTemplateQuery; if &Tiny.Currency.ConfigEvent; = 1 select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName;

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from v20vvlkct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from v20vvlkct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_so
field.check: ma_so not in (select ma_so from v20dmvvct)

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from v20vvlkct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from v20vvlkct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_so
field.check: ma_so not in (select ma_so from v20dmvvct)

text.v: Vào lũy kế theo chỉ tiêu vụ việc, công trình
text.e: Input Project/Job Accumulation by Job Norm
